code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';var Products=function Products(_ref){var product=_ref.product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{src:product.image,variant:"top"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:"".concat(product.numReviews," reviews")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",children:["$",product.price]})]});};export default Products;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const Products = ({product}) => { return ( {product.name} ${product.price} ) } export default Products
